November 22, 1957
WILL & WIUC

(and other invitees to the
special December Board meeting)
Prom: Burton Paulu
Here is John Schwarzwalderâ€™s reply to my letter to him

I do not intend to reply to it* I feel that I made my
points in myprevious letter, and that there is no reason to
prolong the argument or further build It up*
